attributes.action: STOP THE PROPOSED TWO YEAR MOT TESTING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of recent investigation, in the region of 150 people are guaranteed to be killed on U.K roads, if this change is implemented.
Car Insurance will increase, as cars are no longer safer on the roads.
The loss to the economy will run into hundreds of millions of pounds. 38% of MOT Stations, Motor Factors will go into recievership.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP THE PROPOSED TWO YEAR MOT TESTING."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14614.asp

Prime Minister's Office
